{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = F80 front.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Barracuda NextGen Firewall F80 |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.barraguard.com/NG-Firewall-F80.asp |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Barracuda |model = CloudGen Firewall |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = F80 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = BNHW025, BNGF80a |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Router Firewall |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = RYK-WPEA-121N |icid = 6158A-WPEA121N |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;C2358; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6433FM2I-08G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = 256 |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram2chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646F-BYMA; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1543; |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:D8:61 |oui = 00:0E:8E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Grub;0.97;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.38.7;Barracuda Cloudgen Firewall 7.2.2-057;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, SATA 3.0, mSATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.42 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console,, (19200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VGA, RTC w/ battery, power switch, fan headers, buzzer, heatsink, metal case |addchip = LPC Super I/O IC;Nuvoton;NCT5533D;;1;,,, 256K SPI Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT25256B;;1;,,, PCIe Clock Generator;Silicon Labs;SI52138;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3243C;;1;,,, PCI-Express Gen 4 Quad Fanout Buffer;Skyworks;Si53154;;1;,,, 2A Very Low Dropout Regulator w/ Enable;Semtech;SC4215A;;2;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Niko-Sem;GS7103-A;;4;,,, Hex Inverter with Schmitt Trigger Input;Diodes Inc;74LVC14A;;1;,,, 2D Video Graphic Adapter w/ PCIe Interface;Aspeed Tech;AST1400;;1;,,, Single-Phase Synchronous Buck Regulator;ON Semi;NCP81109E;;3;,,, High Current Synchronous Buck Converter;ON Semi;NCP3232N;;4;,,, 3A 3MHz Synchronous Buck Regulator;ON Semi;NCP1593B;;1;,,, Synchronous PWM Switching Converter;ON Semi;NCP3170;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;2;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4413;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.200.200 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = ngf1r3wall |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Micro-Star |manuf_model = MS-S1401 |manuf_rev = v1.0 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = SparkLAN WPEA-121N |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half) |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9382; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MS-S1401VER:1.0", "[[MICRO-STAR]]" and "Model MS-S1401" are silkscreened under the heatsink.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2358 @1.7GHz (Dual-Core) *Memory: 4GB (DDR3) DIMM *Storage: 8MB CMOS Serial Flash, 750GB SATA3 HDD *PCI: 1x PCIe, 1x mSATA slots *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet ports *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9382 (802.11abgn) *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 19V, 3.42A via barrel
==Links of Interest== [https://campus.barracuda.com/product/cloudgenfirewall/doc/71862273/f80-revision-a Product information]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
